items.title: Valencia leader resigns over handling of deadly floods
items.description: A year after flash floods killed 229 people in the Valencia region, Carlos Maz√≥n acknowledged "mistakes" were made.

items.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested as scandal over video leak deepens
items.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking the video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

items.title: Public barred as Tanzanian president sworn in
items.description: President Samia faced little opposition with key rivals either imprisoned or barred from running.

items.title: Justin Baldoni case against Blake Lively dismissed after deadline lapse
items.description: The actor and director's $400m lawsuit against his former co-star is formally ended by a US judge.

items.title: Clooney says Harris replacing Biden was a 'mistake'
items.description: The actor - a prominent Democratic fundraiser - also says he has no regrets about calling for Biden to quit the US presidential race.
